dimension:
23 x 22 1/2 in. (58.42 x 57.15 cm)
2 3/4 in. (6.99 cm) (object part, tassels on fringe)
title: Ceremonial Napkin
description: red warp with red, blue, green, white bands of supplementary silk weft; red dominates; thick wool tassels in various colors; some bands woven in twill weave; tassels hang from warp fringe
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
